content: pippo the little penguin is created by hako amigurumi the size of finished product when made using the indicated hook is approximately 10 cm tall materials needed - 2 5 mm crochet hook - cotton yarn in purple white yellow red pink color - 6 mm safety eyes - fiber fill - sewing needle and pins this is a free pattern made for personal use only you are prohibited to sell any information from this pattern you may sell the finished product made based on this pattern but not for mass production hope you enjoy making pippo the little penguin happy crocheting
